items.title: Fundamentals of Fraud Prevention and Monitoring
items.headline: The fundamentals of fraud prevention and monitoring, in theory and practice.
objectives_summary: How fraud is performed and prevented in general
An extensive list of fraud prevention techniques of different categories and purposes
How fraud prevention strategies are assembled and monitored

items.headline: Regulatory Compliance Requirements of Companies, Institutions, Businesses and Organizations
objectives_summary: You will learn about the Compliance and Regulatory Compliance
You will learn about different Laws and Regulations which are applicable in different countries
You will learn about the core steps to be undertaken to ensure "Regulatory Compliance"

items.headline: This course delves deeper into the Performance Standards as they relate to conducting internal audit projects.
objectives_summary: Explore elements of planning the audit engagement.
Identify methods for appropriately executing the audit engagement.
Identify methods of communicating results to management and the board.

items.title: Filing with Companies House UK
items.headline: Learn how to file the UK statutory annual return with Companies House (CH) and essential Company filing information
objectives_summary: File the annual return with Companies House
Understand what other services and products Companies House offer

items.headline: This course covers critical concepts of AS5 risk factors when identifying significant accounts and more.
objectives_summary: Explore a top down accounting Risk Assessment (RA).
Explore the importance of entity level controls.
Identify types of entity controls.

items.title: Hotel Management - Revenue controls & Income Audit process

visible_instructors.name: Manish
visible_instructors.title: Manish Gupta
visible_instructors.job_title: Hospitality Finance Expert and Business Strategist

items.headline: High level overview of required controls & process to ensure no frauds & leakages. Hotel controls & reporting
objectives_summary: Understand Reporting & Recording Requirements in Hotels
Spot Checks and Verification needed to ensure completeness and accuracy
We will not learn how to make report

items.title: COSO 2013 Control Activity Compliance

visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course teaches the 3 basic principles of Control Activity component of COSO 2013.
objectives_summary: Define the Control Activity component for COSO 2013.
Examine the three principles supporting the control environment.
Analyze sixteen points of focus that supports the three principles of control activities.

items.title: COSO 2013 Control Environment Compliance

visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course explores the 5 basic principles for dealing with Control Environment of COSO 2013.
objectives_summary: Defining the Control Environment for COSO 2013.
Examine the five principles supporting the control environment.
Discuss points of focus that support the five principles of the control environment and how to utilize these points of focus most efficiently in your transition process.

items.title: A Primer For Avoiding Common Financial Statement Fraud

visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course discusses some common financial statement shenanigans to help you avoid being fooled by them.
objectives_summary: Identify the seven most popular recipes for “cooking the books”.
Recognize the triggers that cause people to commit financial statement fraud.
Discover infamous corporate scandals highlighting “financial shenanigans”.

items.title: Developing an Effective FCPA Compliance Program

visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course examines the FCPA compliance process.
objectives_summary: Identify the key provisions of the U.S. Foreign Corrupt Practices Act of 1977 (FCPA).
Explore the attributes of an effective FCPA Compliance Program.
Discover the process to remediate FCPA violations.

items.title: Become an Expert in Reputational Risk in Banking and Finance
items.headline: Learn how Reputational Risk is Quantified and why is it considered a "Terminal Risk" with the help of real world stories
objectives_summary: Clear understanding of how Reputational Risk can prove to be a 'Terminal Risk' in Banking and Finance world
Good knowledge of Historic Events involving crisis to Reputation - Royal Bank of Scotland, Nortern Rock Bank, ICICI Bank, SunTrust Banks
Understand how Reputational Risk is Defined, Measured and Managed
